Start Course

Learning CSS

CSS is a language that describes the style of an HTML document. CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.

Learning HTML5

HTML5 is the latest and most enhanced version of HTML.Technically, HTML is not a programming language, but rather a mark up language.

Learn Javascript

JavaScript not only enables you to add powerful interactions to websites, but is also the foundation of a lot of commonly used libraries (like jQuery) and frameworks (like AngularJS, ReactJS and NodeJS).

Learning Python

Python is one of the simplest server-side languages out there, and is used mostly for creating dynamic content.

  • Learn HTML5HTML5
  • Learn CSSCSS
  • Learn JavaScriptJavaScript
  • Learn PythonPHP
